title: kEraLa vaibhavam
sahitya:
kEraLa vaibhavam ahO ahO anubhavaika vEdyam


caraNam    nArikELa kadalI vamshI vanAdi sushyAmala shObhitam 
sundara nArI mandiram vara vaLLattOL mahOdayAdi 
mahA kavinAm prabhAvitam vaidyanAthAdi mahA gAyaka prasiddham 
muraLI gAna rasika jana parivESThitam kathakaLI kaLA maNTapam
